name: FedEx Dallas NL-Only Regression
description: ChatGPT NL-only call regression test - should NOT require inputs parameter
prompt: Build me an acquisition model for a 75,000 SF industrial warehouse in Dallas, TX. Purchase price is $8.5M at a 6.25% going-in cap. Financing is 70% LTV at 6.0% fixed rate, 25-year amortization with 12 months IO. Single tenant (FedEx) paying $8.75 PSF NNN with 3% annual escalations, lease runs through December 2029. Plan to hold 5 years and exit at a 6.75% cap.
notes: This test verifies NL-only calls (no inputs parameter) work correctly. Introduced after ChatGPT was calling validate_inputs instead of build_model.
